top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
That's my wife, we could sit around for days not saying a word, the second I go and pick up the guitar to practice, she's right there trying to ask me things.

Can we add like knitting/ crocheting in public?



Like I just want to relax on my lunch break, I don't want to explain wtf I'm doing my guy
Unless the question is really important. Then ask the question. Their instrument isn’t going to get up and walk away.
Dude you're spot on. Ive wondered if maybe the part of my brain responsible for speech is the one used to play guitar, I can do exactly one of those and no more.

top_comments_best.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
That's my wife, we could sit around for days not saying a word, the second I go and pick up the guitar to practice, she's right there trying to ask me things.

Can we add like knitting/ crocheting in public?



Like I just want to relax on my lunch break, I don't want to explain wtf I'm doing my guy
Dude you're spot on. Ive wondered if maybe the part of my brain responsible for speech is the one used to play guitar, I can do exactly one of those and no more.

Or just don’t interrupt ppl who are doing anything without checking for a cue that it’s okay. I wear headphones almost constantly now because so many ppl seem to think if they can see you they can accost you with a conversation. I’m starting to notice there are a lot more of us introverts out there than ppl previously thought! Happy to not talk. Thanks!
